solution_line_template: Thrice the number of chocolate squares that Mike ate is {mike_ate} squares * {thrice} = <<{mike_ate}*{thrice}={thrice_mike}>>{thrice_mike} squares.
Jenny therefore ate {thrice_mike} squares + {jenny_more_than_thrice} squares = <<{thrice_mike}+{jenny_more_than_thrice}={jenny_ate}>>{jenny_ate} chocolate squares
